      • XboxGamepad

        public XboxGamepad​(int port)
        Create with no Scaler
        Parameters:
        port - DS Port of gamepad

      • XboxGamepad

        public XboxGamepad​(int port,
                   double xDeadband,
                   double yDeadband)
        Create with default smoothCubic Curve
        Parameters:
        port - DS Port of gamepad
        xDeadband - deadband value for x axis
        yDeadband - deadband value for y axis

      • XboxGamepad

        public XboxGamepad​(int port,
                   double leftXDeadband,
                   double leftYDeadband,
                   double rightXDeadband,
                   double rightYDeadband)
        Create with default smoothCubic Curve with seperate left and right deadbands
        Parameters:
        port - DS Port of gamepad
        leftXDeadband - deadband value for left stick x axis
        leftYDeadband - deadband value for left stick y axis
        rightXDeadband - deadband value for right stick x axis
        rightYDeadband - deadband value for right stick y axis

      • XboxGamepad

        public XboxGamepad​(int port,
                   Curve xCurve,
                   Curve yCurve)
        Create with curves
        Parameters:
        port - DS Port of gamepad
        xCurve - Curve to adjust X Axis
        yCurve - Curve to adjust Y Axis

      • XboxGamepad

        public XboxGamepad​(int port,
                   Curve lxCurve,
                   Curve lyCurve,
                   Curve rxCurve,
                   Curve ryCurve)
        Create with seperate curves for left and right
        Parameters:
        port - DS Port of gamepad
        lxCurve - Curve to adjust left thumbstick X Axis
        lyCurve - Curve to adjust left thumstick Y Axis
        rxCurve - Curve to adjust right thumbstick X Axis
        ryCurve - Curve to adjust right thumstick Y Axis
